data_table.description: This subject phenotype data table includes eligibility and enrollment information (n=6 variables), relationship and twin status, anthropometric measurements (n=21 variables; height, weight, BMI, circumference, skinfold test, obesity classifications, body fat measurements, resistance, and reactance), blood pressure and heart rate (n=5 variables), diagnosis (n=14 variables; hypertension, diabetes, angina, heart attack, stroke, and heart disease), glucose and cholesterol measurements (n=21 variables; glucose, insulin, leptin, adiponectin, cholesterol, TG, VLDL, LDL, and HDL), smoking status (n=19 variables), treatment and medications for hypertension, diabetes, and heart disease (n=19 variables), and physical activity measurements (n=54 variables; work, walking, sitting, and leisure).

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: Unrelated
variable.description: Member of set of unrelated individuals as determined for BMI GWAS

variable.name: Twin
variable.description: Which of a pair of twins used in genetic analyses

variable.name: Census_Region
variable.description: Census Region of Samoa

variable.name: GWAS_Eligible
variable.description: Eligible for inclusion in the GWAS

variable.name: Gender
variable.description: Gender of participant

variable.name: Dec_Age
variable.description: Age at enrollment

variable.name: Pregnant
variable.description: Pregnancy status at enrollment

variable.name: Farming
variable.description: Participants primary occupation is farming/plantation work

variable.name: Height
variable.description: Height of participant

variable.name: Weight
variable.description: Weight of participant

variable.name: BMI
variable.description: Body mass index of participant

variable.name: Obesity_Int
variable.description: Obesity Classification using International Cutoffs (STEPS)

variable.name: Obesity_Poly
variable.description: Obesity Classification using Polynesian Cutoffs

variable.name: OWOB_Binary_Poly
variable.description: Obese or Overweight using Polynesian Cutoffs

variable.name: Arm_Circ
variable.description: Arm Circumference Average

variable.name: Abd_Circ
variable.description: Abdominal Circumference Average

variable.name: Hip_Circ
variable.description: Hip Circumference Average

variable.name: Calf_Circ
variable.description: Calf Circumference Average

variable.name: Tri_Skf
variable.description: Triceps Skinfold (Average)

variable.name: For_Skf
variable.description: Forearm Skinfold (Average)

variable.name: Sub_Skf
variable.description: Subscapular Skinfold (Average)

variable.name: Abd_Skf
variable.description: Abdominal Skinfold (Average)

variable.name: Sup_Skf
variable.description: Suprailiac Skinfold (Average)

variable.name: RESIST
variable.description: Resistance (bioelectrical impedance analysis)

variable.name: REACT
variable.description: Reactance (bioelectrical impedance analysis)

variable.name: CUFFSIZE
variable.description: Blood Pressure Cuff Size

variable.name: Systolic_BP
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure (average of last two measurements)

variable.name: Systolic_BP_Av3
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure (average of all three measurements)

variable.name: Diastolic_BP
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure (average of last two measurements)

variable.name: Diastolic_BP_Av3
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure (average of all three measurements)

variable.name: Current_smoke
variable.description: Current Smoker

variable.name: Age_smoking
variable.description: Age Started Smoking (years)

variable.name: Length_sm_years
variable.description: Length of time smoking (years)

variable.name: Length_sm_months
variable.description: Length of time smoking (months)

variable.name: Man_cigarettes
variable.description: Number of manufactured cigarettes per day

variable.name: Hand_cigarettes
variable.description: Number of hand-rolled cigarettes per day

variable.name: Pipes
variable.description: Number of pipes per day

variable.name: Cigars
variable.description: Number of cigars per day

variable.name: Past_smoker
variable.description: Past Smoker

variable.name: Age_Quit
variable.description: Age Quit Smoking

variable.name: Length_Quit_Years
variable.description: Length of time since Quitting (years)

variable.name: Length_Quit_Months
variable.description: Length of time since Quitting (months)

variable.name: Length_Quit_Weeks
variable.description: Length of time since Quitting (weeks)

variable.name: Smokeless_tobacco_use
variable.description: Do you use smokeless tobacco?

variable.name: Snuff_mouth
variable.description: How many times per day do you use snuff by mouth?

variable.name: Snuff_nose
variable.description: How many times per day do you use snuff by nose?

variable.name: Betel_quid
variable.description: How many times per day do you use Betel / Quid?

variable.name: Other_smokeless
variable.description: How many times per day do you use other types of smokeless tobacco?

variable.name: Type_other_smokeless
variable.description: What type of other smokeless tobacco do you use?

variable.name: Heart_Rate
variable.description: Heart Rate (measured during blood pressure assessment) (Average)

variable.name: HRSSINCEATE
variable.description: Hours since last ate
variable.comment: This field contains integer values for hours with all values greater than 10 encoded as >10

variable.name: Fasting
variable.description: Fasting Status

variable.name: Finger_Glucose
variable.description: Blood Glucose from finger stick assessment

variable.name: Biochemistry_Complete
variable.description: Participants biochemistry completed

variable.name: Insulin
variable.description: Insulin from venous blood sample

variable.name: Glucose
variable.description: Glucose from venous blood sample

variable.name: Leptin
variable.description: Leptin from venous blood sample

variable.name: Adiponectin
variable.description: Adiponectin from venous blood sample

variable.name: Cholesterol
variable.description: Cholesterol from venous blood sample (mg/dL)

variable.name: Cholesterol_mmol
variable.description: Cholesterol from venous blood sample (mmol)

variable.name: Total_Cholesterol_Binary
variable.description: Total cholesterol above or equal to (1) or below (0) 5.2 mmol/l (AHA criteria)

variable.name: NetTG
variable.description: Net Triglycerides from venous blood sample (mg/dL)

variable.name: Triglycerides_mmol
variable.description: Net Triglycerides from venous blood sample (mmol)

variable.name: Triglycerides_Binary
variable.description: Triglycerides above (1) or below or equal to (0) 1.69 mmol/l (AHA criteria)

variable.name: VLDL_C
variable.description: VLDL-C from venous blood sample

variable.name: LDL_C
variable.description: LDL-C from venous blood sample (mg/dL)

variable.name: LDL_mmol
variable.description: LDL-C from venous blood sample (mmol)

variable.name: LDL_Binary
variable.description: LDL cholesterol above or equal to (1) or below (0) 2.59 mmol/l (AHA criteria)

variable.name: HDL_C
variable.description: HDL-C from venous blood sample (mg/dL)

variable.name: HDL_mmol
variable.description: HDL-C from venous blood sample (mmol)

variable.name: HDL_Binary
variable.description: HDL cholesterol below or equal to (1) or above (0) 1.03 mmol/l (men) or 1.29 mmol/l (women) (AHA criteria)

variable.name: Hypertension
variable.description: Based on Sys>140 OR Dias>90 (Based on physical examination & questionnaire data)

variable.name: Hypertension_diagnosis
variable.description: Self-reported Hypertension diagnosis

variable.name: Hyp_diagnosis_years
variable.description: How many years ago were you diagnosed with hypertension?

variable.name: Hyp_meds
variable.description: Are you taking medication for hypertension?

variable.name: Hyp_meds_years
variable.description: How many years have you been taking these meds?

variable.name: Past_hyp_meds
variable.description: Have you taken hypertension meds in the past?

variable.name: Past_hyp_meds_years
variable.description: How many years did you take meds for?

variable.name: Hyp_traditional_healer
variable.description: Have you seen a traditional healer for your hypertension?

variable.name: Hyp_traditional_meds
variable.description: Are you taking traditional remedies for hypertension?

variable.name: Traditional_remedy_name_hyp
variable.description: Name of traditional hypertension remedy

variable.name: Hypertension_13
variable.description: Hypertension based on average of two BP measurements or hypertension meds

variable.name: Hypertension_All3
variable.description: Hypertension diagnosis based on average of all three BP measurements or hypertension meds

variable.name: Diabetes_Status
variable.description: Diabetes Status (based on venous blood sample ONLY)

variable.name: Diabetes_Binary
variable.description: Diabetes Status (based on venous blood sample and questionnaire data)

variable.name: Diabetes_diagnosis
variable.description: Have you ever been diagnosed with diabetes? (Based on questionnaire)

variable.name: Diabetes_diagnosis_years
variable.description: How many years ago were you diagnosed with diabetes?

variable.name: Diabetes_treatment
variable.description: Type of diabetes treatment

variable.name: Db_traditional_healer
variable.description: Have you seen a traditional healer for your diabetes?

variable.name: Db_traditional_meds
variable.description: Are you taking traditional remedies for diabetes?

variable.name: Traditional_remedy_name_db
variable.description: Name of traditional diabetes remedy

variable.name: Angina
variable.description: Angina diagnosis - Self-report

variable.name: Heart_attack
variable.description: Have you ever had a heart attack? Self-report

variable.name: Stroke
variable.description: Have you ever had a stroke? Self-report

variable.name: Heart_disease_diagnosis
variable.description: Have you ever been diagnosed with heart disease? (Based on questionnaire)

variable.name: Hd_diagnosis_years
variable.description: How many years ago were you diagnosed with heart disease?

variable.name: Hd_meds
variable.description: Are you taking medication for heart disease?

variable.name: Hd_meds_name
variable.description: Name of heart disease meds

variable.name: Hd_meds_years
variable.description: How many years have you been taking heart disease meds?

variable.name: Past_hd_meds
variable.description: Have you taken heart diseasemeds in the past?

variable.name: Past_hd_meds_years
variable.description: How many years did you take meds for?

variable.name: Hd_traditional_healer
variable.description: Have you seen a traditional healer for your heart disease?

variable.name: Hd_traditional_meds
variable.description: Are you taking traditional remedies for heart disease?

variable.name: Traditional_remedy_name_hd
variable.description: Name of traditional heart disease remedy

variable.name: BIA_BF
variable.description: Percent Body Fat based on Bioelectrical Impedance (BIA). Polynesian-specific equations: Swinburn et al., 1999 & Keighley et al., 2006

variable.name: SKF_BF
variable.description: Percent Body Fat based on Skinfold Measurements. Polynesian-specific equations: Swinburn et al., 1999

variable.name: BMI_BF
variable.description: Percent Body Fat based on Body Mass Index. Polynesian-specific equations: Swinburn et al., 1999

variable.name: Work_Sedentary
variable.description: Does your work involve mostly sedentary activity?

variable.name: Work_Vigorous
variable.description: Does your work involve vigorous activities?

variable.name: Work_Vigorous_Days
variable.description: How many days per week do you do vigorous activity as part of your work? (days)

variable.name: Work_Vigorous_Hours
variable.description: Time spent doing work-related vigorous activities (hours)

variable.name: Work_Vigorous_Mins
variable.description: Time spent doing work-related vigorous activities (minutes)

variable.name: Work_Moderate
variable.description: Does your work involve moderate activities?

variable.name: Work_Moderate_Days
variable.description: How many days per week do you do moderate activity as part of your work? (days)

variable.name: Work_Moderate_Hours
variable.description: Time spent doing work-related moderate activities (hours)

variable.name: Work_Moderate_Mins
variable.description: Time spent doing work-related moderate activities (minutes)

variable.name: Workday_Length
variable.description: Length of a typical work day

variable.name: Walking_Cycling
variable.description: Do you walk or cycle for more than 10 minutes?

variable.name: Walking_Cycling_Days
variable.description: How many days per week do you walk or cycle? (days)

variable.name: Walking_Cycling_Hours
variable.description: Time spent walking or cycling (hours)

variable.name: Walking_Cycling_Mins
variable.description: Time spent walking or cycling (minutes)

variable.name: Leisure_Sitting
variable.description: Do you spend most of your leisure time sitting?

variable.name: Leisure_Vigorous
variable.description: Do you do vigorous activities during your leisure time?

variable.name: Leisure_Vigorous_Days
variable.description: How many days per week do you do vigorous activity in your leisure time? (days)

variable.name: Leisure_Vigorous_Hours
variable.description: Time spent doing vigorous leisure time activities (hours)

variable.name: Leisure_Vigorous_Mins
variable.description: Time spent doing vigorous leisure time activities (minutes)

variable.name: Leisure_Moderate
variable.description: Do you do moderate activities during your leisure time?

variable.name: Leisure_Moderate_Days
variable.description: How many days per week do you do moderate activity in your leisure time? (days)

variable.name: Leisure_Moderate_Hours
variable.description: Time spent doing moderate leisure time activities (hours)

variable.name: Leisure_Moderate_Mins
variable.description: Time spent doing moderate leisure time activities (minutes)

variable.name: Sitting_Hours
variable.description: Hours spent sitting during a typical day

variable.name: Sitting_Mins
variable.description: Minutes spent sitting during a typical day

variable.name: TypicalDaily_WorkVigorousMins
variable.description: Minutes of vigorous work activity (on a typical day)

variable.name: TypicalDaily_WorkModerateMins
variable.description: Minutes of moderate work activity (on a typical day)

variable.name: TypicalDaily_TransportMins
variable.description: Minutes of Walking/Cycling (on a typical day)

variable.name: TypicalDaily_LeisureVigorousMins
variable.description: Minutes of vigorous leisure time activity (on a typical day)

variable.name: TypicalDaily_LeisureModerateMins
variable.description: Minutes of moderate leisure time activity (on a typical day)

variable.name: TypicalDaily_SittingMins
variable.description: Minutes of sitting/reclining (on a typical day)

variable.name: MET_VigWork_Week
variable.description: MET value of vigorous work activity per week

variable.name: MET_ModWork_Week
variable.description: MET value of moderate work activity per week

variable.name: MET_Transport_Week
variable.description: MET value of transport (walking/cycling) activity per week

variable.name: MET_VigLeisure_Week
variable.description: MET value of vigorous leisure activities per week

variable.name: MET_ModLeisure_Week
variable.description: MET value of moderate leisure activities per week

variable.name: Total_MET_Week
variable.description: Total MET value for all weekly activity

variable.name: MeetsWHO_Rec
variable.description: Meets WHO Recommendations of >= 600 MET-minutes activity per week

variable.name: Mins_VigWork_Week
variable.description: Vigorous work activity (minutes per week)

variable.name: Mins_ModWork_Week
variable.description: Moderate work activity (minutes per week)

variable.name: Mins_Transport_Week
variable.description: Transport-related (walking/cycling) activity (minutes per week)

variable.name: Mins_VigLeisure_Week
variable.description: Vigorous leisure activity (minutes per week)

variable.name: Mins_ModLeisure_Week
variable.description: Moderate leisure activity (minutes per week)

variable.name: Daily_TotalMVPA_Mins
variable.description: Total minutes of MVPA per day

variable.name: Daily_WorkMVPA_Mins
variable.description: Minutes of work-related MVPA per day

variable.name: Daily_TransportMVPA_Mins
variable.description: Minutes of transport-related (walking/cycling) MVPA per day

variable.name: Daily_LeisureMVPA_Mins
variable.description: Minutes of leisure time MVPA per day

variable.name: No_WorkMVPA
variable.description: Reported NO work related physical activity

variable.name: No_TransportMVPA
variable.description: Reported no transport-related physical activity

variable.name: No_LeisureMVPA
variable.description: Reported no leisure time physical activity

variable.name: No_Vigorous
variable.description: Repored no vigorous activity (across any category)

variable.name: Percent_WorkMVPA
variable.description: Percentage of physical activity completed in work-related activities

variable.name: Percent_TransportMVPA
variable.description: Percentage of physical activity completed in transport activities (walking/cycling)

variable.name: Percent_LeisureMVPA
variable.description: Percentage of physical activity completed in leisure time activities

variable.name: GWAS_Genotyped
variable.description: Participants genotyped

variable.name: GWAS_Genotyped_Eligible
variable.description: Eligible participants genotyped

variable.name: GWAS_BMI
variable.description: Eligible participants genotyped and examined in GWAS of BMI
